61//*****************************************************************************
62//
66//
67//*****************************************************************************
68typedef enum
69{
70 AM_HAL_INFO_INFOSPACE_CURRENT_INFO0, // Currently active INFO0
71 AM_HAL_INFO_INFOSPACE_CURRENT_INFO1, // Currently active INFO1
72 AM_HAL_INFO_INFOSPACE_OTP_INFO0, // INFO0 from OTP (regardless of current)
73 AM_HAL_INFO_INFOSPACE_OTP_INFO1, // INFO1 from OTP (regardless of current)
74 AM_HAL_INFO_INFOSPACE_MRAM_INFO0, // INFO0 from MRAM (regardless of current)
75 AM_HAL_INFO_INFOSPACE_MRAM_INFO1, // INFO1 from MRAM (regardless of current)
76} am_hal_info_infospace_e;
77
79
80//*****************************************************************************
81//
83//
84//*****************************************************************************
85extern bool am_hal_info0_valid(void);
86
87//*****************************************************************************
88//
89// AM_INFO_FLD2VAL()
90// This macro allows decoding of INFOx register fields, similar
91// to the CMSIS _FLD2VAL macro.
92// Parameters:
93// info: 0, 1, or C (C must be capitalized)
94// field: The field of the register.
95// value: The value of the entire register as read from the INFOx space.
96//
97// AM_INFO_VAL2FLD() is not provided as the INFOx register definitions already generate these for each register.
98//
99//*****************************************************************************
100#define AM_INFO_FLD2VAL(info, field, value) (((uint32_t)(value) & AM_REG_INFO ##info## _ ## field ## _Msk) >> AM_REG_INFO ## info ## _ ## field ## _Pos)
101
102//*****************************************************************************
103//
143//
144//*****************************************************************************
145extern uint32_t
146am_hal_info0_read(am_hal_info_infospace_e eInfoSpace,
147 uint32_t ui32wordOffset,
148 uint32_t ui32NumWords,
149 uint32_t *pui32Dst);
150

191//

193extern uint32_t
194am_hal_info1_read(am_hal_info_infospace_e eInfoSpace,
195 uint32_t ui32wordOffset,
196 uint32_t ui32NumWords,
197 uint32_t *pui32Dst);
198

247 uint32_t ui32InfoKey, uint32_t *pui32Src,
248 uint32_t ui32Offset, uint32_t ui32NumWords);
